name: Magmar

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Smog
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

flavorText: Found at the mouths of volcanoes and extremely hard to spot. There are very few instances of capturing this Pokémon.
competitiveHistory: Fossil Magmar was a decent disruptor with Smokescreen forcing the opponent to flip for their attacks. However, its low damage output and Water weakness limited its competitive use compared to the Base Set Magmar with its more aggressive attacks.

rulings.ruling: Smokescreen's effect ends after the opponent's next turn, even if they didn't attack.
If the opponent flips tails for Smokescreen, their entire attack does nothing - no damage, no effects.
The opponent must flip for Smokescreen even if switching occurs, as long as the Pokemon that was affected by Smokescreen attacks.
